extendedInfo.description: eMeals â Start saving your time, money and sanity with the meal planning solution that has solved the dinner dilemma for hundreds of thousands of families! The app allows current eMeals subscribers to access their breakfast, lunch, and dinner meal plans for easy planning, shopping and cooking. Not a current eMeals user? Not to worry, enjoy a complimentary 7-day meal plan in the food style of your choice. Start meal planning with the eMeals app, which provides: * Your choice of over 50 meal plan options * Weekly meal plan that features 7 new dinner recipes * Organized grocery list for easy shopping * In-store sales featured in recipes for store specific meal plans * Ability to customize your grocery list by skipping meals and adding items Tailor your meal plan to your food style by choosing from any of these: * Classic Meals * Clean Eating * Gluten Free * Low Carb * Low Fat * Natural & Organic * Paleo * Portion Control * Simple Gourmet * Slow Cooker * Vegetarian eMeals is a comprehensive meal planning resource that helps provide healthy and delicious dinners for busy families and individuals. Endorsed by financial guru Dave Ramsey and highlighted in the Oprah Winfrey blog, the eMeals weekly dinner plans include grocery shopping lists and recipe instructions that are simple and easy to follow. Download today and take the stress out of planning, shopping and cooking delicious, homemade meals.

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Ive user this service before an app and before all the specialized menu options!  So happy to see the evolutionbof such an amazing service! Minor critique or suggestion is if you have multiple menus if there was a way to merge the shopping list into one shopping list.  Example lunch menu with Paleo dinner...great app and great service
reviews.author: Jenny Adams

reviews.title: Great Service
reviews.comment: This is a great service, and a well thought out app.  When are you going to make a version that\'s compatible with the Nexus 7?  That\'s usually what I have in the kitchen with me.
reviews.author: John Madray

reviews.title: Family friendly
reviews.comment: Fast family-friendly convenient awesome app the best!
reviews.author: kristina atwater

reviews.title: App for current emeals subscribers is ok
reviews.comment: Updating my rating from 3 to 4 stars because it no longer crashes! Yeah! Still not 5, because there is room for improvement. An absolute MUST is a way to combine multiple plans if you have them. A list that collapses by category would be nice. I would also like to see what meals each item is used for like on the paper lists. And emeals could wow me with offering possible substitutions when I can\'t find something while I am in the store.
reviews.author: N Ward

reviews.title: Handy app from a useful service
Crashing
reviews.comment: I really want to like this app, but it keeps crashing and I have yet to use it because of all the crashes. Please fix for nexus 4! I really want to use it!
reviews.author: Katy Sirjord

reviews.title: Ingredient list does not update well
reviews.comment: When I skip a meal with a shared ingredient it does not completely update the shopping list (just tells you part of it was skipped). I was looking forward to using the shopping list on the app but I\'m still going to have to make a paper list since I only have time to cook a few nights a week. I should not have to look through all the meals several times while I\'m shopping.
reviews.author: Tim Trickel

reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy S3
reviews.comment: Was able to sign in after the 5th time
reviews.author: Travis Ostlund

reviews.title: Disappointing
reviews.comment: This is not nearly tailored enough for the price they charge.  Where do I tell the program that I hate blueberries, and I prefer dark meat over the ubiquitous chicken breasts? How do I get it to give me recipes I will actually use? And the descriptions of the menu plan options don\'t give enough information nor any examples.
reviews.author: LeAnn Robinson

reviews.comment: Would love to use but subscription to use is too costly. I didn\'t see anywhere to get the complimentary 7day meal plan like the app described! Uninstalling :( Please come up with a truly free app like this or even offer the app at low cost without having to pay a monthly subscription because the app isn\'t actually free.
reviews.author: Stacy Boone

reviews.title: Login issues since update
reviews.comment: Every since the new update I can\'t login I know my password and login is right bc I can login online fine. I loved the app before was a four but now I can\'t use it help I have uninstalled and re installed a few tines
reviews.author: Michelle Sumrall

reviews.title: Not so free...
reviews.comment: App may be free but to use it you need a paid account. Uninstalling!!
reviews.author: Tamara Sharp

reviews.title: Great app. Finally here
reviews.comment: My only complaint. Why can\'t i use this on my Nexus 7? it would be handy while cooking to use this.
reviews.author: Jonathan Shaver

reviews.title: It\'s awesome
reviews.comment: Makes my planning meals easier.  I like how there\'s a grocery list that comes with the meals and one can check them off.
reviews.author: Paola Martin

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: User friendly. Easy to use and check off items as you shop.
reviews.author: Michael Board

reviews.title: So disappointed!!
reviews.comment: We have used emeals for awhile and love it! I was so excited to see you guys have an ap but it NEVER opens for me! I have uninstalled and re installed...did not help. Also have reported problem. Please fix this, it will make my life easier.
reviews.author: Ashley Ingram

reviews.title: Love
reviews.comment: Love having my meals and shopping lists all here!
reviews.author: Mandy Bradford

reviews.title: Sad day!
reviews.comment: I downloaded the app as soon as it became available and LOVED it! But I haven\'t been able to use our since the last update because it force closes every time I try to open it. I really hope it gets fixed soon since its almost time to go grocery shopping.
reviews.author: Jessica Mason

reviews.title: Great app for meal planning
reviews.comment: Works well and syncs between mac, android, and ios.  A windows app would be nice.   I love being able to save a recipe from the web
reviews.author: Leigh Ann Hawkins
